How to use:


• add budget using "+$"
 			• +$3,000 budget for Jan


• add expenses using "$"
 			• $50 eating out
 			• $20 netflix
 			• I owe Mike $20
 			• amazon refund $-50
 			• Rent $1500


• organize expenses by utilizing sub-lists
 			• Apartment Expenses
 			• 			↳ Rent $1000
 			• 			↳ Water $40
 			• 			↳ Electricity $97
